languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете выражение брезгливого отвращения на лице Абеляра. Кажется, у сенешаля есть весьма сильное мнение касательно тех, кого Ризза назвала Пустотным братством.{/n}
{n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете выражение брезгливого отвращения на лице Абеляра. Кажется, у сенешаля есть весьма сильное мнение касательно тех, кого Ризза назвала Пустотным братством.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの顔が嫌悪感で歪むのに気づく。彼はリザが虚空の仲間と呼ぶ者たちについて、ことさら強固な意見を持っているらしかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの顔が嫌悪感で歪むのに気づく。彼はリザが虚空の仲間と呼ぶ者たちについて、ことさら強固な意見を持っているらしかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez une moue de dégoût sur le visage d'Abélard. Il semble avoir un avis bien tranché sur les individus qui composent la Communauté du vide de Ryzza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez une moue de dégoût sur le visage d'Abélard. Il semble avoir un avis bien tranché sur les individus qui composent la Communauté du vide de Ryzza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，阿贝拉德扭曲着脸，露出了厌恶的表情。看来，他对莱萨口中的虚空协联有着相当大的意见。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，阿贝拉德扭曲着脸，露出了厌恶的表情。看来，他对莱萨口中的虚空协联有着相当大的意见。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, wie sich Abelards Gesichtsausdruck vor Abscheu verzieht. Er scheint eine ziemlich klare Meinung von den Leuten zu haben, die Ryzza als Gefährten der Leere bezeichnet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, wie sich Abelards Gesichtsausdruck vor Abscheu verzieht. Er scheint eine ziemlich klare Meinung von den Leuten zu haben, die Ryzza als Gefährten der Leere bezeichnet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Abelard muestra una expresión de descontento. Parece que la gente a la que Ryzza llama Hermandad del Vacío no es de su agrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Abelard muestra una expresión de descontento. Parece que la gente a la que Ryzza llama Hermandad del Vacío no es de su agrado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın tiksintiyle yüzünü buruşturduğunu fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa Abelard, Ryzza'nın Uçsuz Kardeşliği dediği insanlar hakkında epey sert fikirlere sahip.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Abelard's face twist in disgust. It would seem he has a rather strong opinion on the individuals to whom Ryzza refers as the Fellowship of the Void.{/n}
